<Text>The Appenzell Wars
1:
--------------------
Text: Appenzell Wars:  The wars were a successful uprising of cooperative groups, such as the farmers of Appenzell or the craftsmen of the city of St. Gallen, against the traditional medieval power structure represented by the House of Habsburg and the Prince-Abbot of the Abbey of St. Gall.
Triplets:<Appenzell Wars
